entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cache compaction will never start #59875
  • Assertion failed 'val->OperIs(GT_IND, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_CNS_INT)' #59871
    7.0.0
  • Scenario: Make it easy to find a certificate appropriate to a target hostname #59870
    7.0.0
  • Support for asymmetrical core energy efficiency #59866
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 RC 1 ASP.NET Core Blazor Microsoft Identity Libraries Errors when Published #59864
  • JIT: missing conditional branch merging across multiple BBs #59863
    Future
  • FontStyle and FontWeight localization #59862
  • [tvOS] System.ExecutionEngineException : Attempting to JIT compile method while running in aot-only mode. #59855

Closed

  • Type.IsAssignable() treats all enum arrays assignable from each other #59877
  • dotnet --info from x64 on ARM64 machine reports both x64 and ARM64 paths #59832
  • CS0433 The type 'ImageConverter' exists in both.... #59807
    Future
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeIntermediateWithInvalidRevocationName(pkiOptions: AllRevocation | IssuerAuthorityHasDesignatedOcspResponder) #59627
  • Wrong X509 chain selected when we have multiple viable options #59584
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests.TimestampRequestTests.BuildExpectedRequest_FromHashAndOid(viaSpan: True) #59455
  • Unix file enumerator isn't thread safe #24295
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Tests.*.DoesntExistThenCreate_ReturnsDefaultValues fails on CI #30108
    7.0.0
  • Expose _version in List<T> and other collections #59854
  • System.Text.Json.Tests crashing with segfault in CI #57198
    7.0.0
  • AES using legacy code The string after encryption and decryption is not equivalent to the original one #57808
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Move runtime rolling builds to run twice a day on main #59884
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix code heap reservation size #59883
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix genCodeForInitBlkUnroll for x86 #59873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port workload description localization changes to main #59872
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] [mono][jit] Fix a JIT assert. #59869
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix JS debugger tests #59868
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make libraries tests use the same config as the matching libraries build. #59867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Do not flush serializer buffers before first IAsyncEnumerable element is fetched #59865
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Fix a JIT assert. #59861
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Optimize DateTime.Equals #59857
    area-System.Runtime
  • Enable Crossgen for FreeBSD, now that it is actually implemented. #59853
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Annotate methods that get MethodBase from a stackwalk as RUC #59851
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Re-enable Windows test that verifies DriveInfo.VolumeLabel setter fails on SUBST'd drive #59850
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix Unix ARM64 RtlRestoreContext implementation #59849
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.0

Merged

  • Change some P/Invokes back to non-blittable + GeneratedDllImport for better usability #59876
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Use ProductVersion in how-to-debug-dump #59848
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Refactoring XslCompiledTransform #59475
    area-System.Xml
  • Produce symbols archives #59842
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Pass directory path from call-site #59858
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix NRT warnings in source generated code #59817
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Remove 3 active issues #59790
    area-System.IO
  • Fix System.Speech.Tests OtherTests.PromptBuilder test on non-English OS #59524
    community-contribution
  • Do not flush serializer buffers before first IAsyncEnumerable element is fetched #59808
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Use the short form of an opcode in `ILGenerator.EmitWriteLine`. #59836
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Use `.maxstack 8` in the `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe` IL code. #59840
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Fix the --runtime-arg argument in runtime-test.js. #59852
    arch-wasm
  • Arm64: Align methods containing loops to 32B #59828
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update WCF dependencies on the compat pack (#59764) #59820
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Fix Unix ARM64 RtlRestoreContext implementation #59831
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: fix register arg size computation for OSR #59789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Improve value numbering for casts #59841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add back the nethost archive. #59847
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_MUL_LONG` for ARM64 #57926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Clean up the documentation for the library testing #59401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix resolveVirtualMethodHelper #59742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Don't regress SkipLocalsInit optimization on <= NET6 #59797
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update workload localization file directory structure #59827
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move MakeReproPackage logic to a shared location #59796
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocked
  • Clean up fix for single-reg returned normalize-on-load vars #59645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite XslNumber.ConvertToDecimal #55868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Fix codeql checks #59839
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Loosen strict KeyValuePair deserialization logic (#59450) #59757
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Refactoring XmlWriterSettings #59467
    area-System.Xml
  • Refactoring XmlReaderSettings #59409
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • More tweaks to regex source generator code #59834
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Adjust SkipOnCoreClr for Match_ExcessPrefix test #59564
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Produce symbols archives #59843
    source-build, area-Setup, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] More typescript conversion #59655
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #59846
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters #59741
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Add beginnings of support for WASI. #59752
    arch-wasm
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • JIT: better support for patchpoints in try regions #59784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch Windows Checked build to `-O2` from `-O1` #59235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-01
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue with empty character sets #1615
  • Use newly added rooting mechanism in CoreCLR tests #1614
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • FreeBSD build #1607
  • detect and throw NotSupported for balancing capture group #1613
  • LLHTTP ConfigureRequest/other simplification & fixes #1606
    area-LLHTTP

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net 6 sdk rc1 - Nuget Credentials Provider plugin not being used properly #21690
  • .NET 6 RC2 Update for macOS and Windows Arm64 #21686
  • Self-contained publish/build error #21677
  • Workload resolver should check for WorkloadManifest.json file instead of just looking for a directory #21676
    6.0.2xx
  • Ensure generated GlobalUsings file can be deleted as part of Clean #21667
  • msdeploy vs zipdeploy #21666
  • Implicit architecture targeting not in place for `dotnet tool install` #21660
    6.0.1xx

Closed

  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT build on Linux fails for SixLabors.ImageSharp #21679
  • NETSDK1179 (for `-r`) over-reports #21560

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1398988 #21689
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1398913 #21683
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Backport to Main `Add support for localized component names msbuild property` #21663
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Merge 6.0.1xx-rc2 to main #21662
    Area-Workloads
  • Merge 6.0.1xx-rc2 to 6.0.1xx #21661
    Area-Workloads
  • Simplify hash implementation #21654

Merged

  • Hide RazorGeneral rule file properties #21659
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Make workload descriptions localizable #21189
    Area-Workloads
  • Backport to 6.0 GA `Add support for localized component names msbuild property` #21664
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Unconditionally prevent global usings file from being recorded in FileWrites #21623
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix over-warning bug when specifying runtime CLI option on dotnet run #21561
    Area-CLI
  • [Razor] Templatize baseline files target framework moniker (#21603) #21612
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add OS and Process Architecture #21517
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Implicit RID support #19725
    Area-External

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to generate deterministic builds in C# without build environment influence. #56904

Closed

  • VS debugger should stop on the first line of async Main method when the debugging is started with the "Step Into" or "Step Over" command #32101
    Compiler.Next
  • Order members listed by Debugger to favor data-storing members #40179
    Compiler.Next
  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    17.0
  • Unskip GenericAttributeParameter_01 test #56664
    17.1
  • C# LSP in Razor scenarios returns `null` completion results when typing quickly #56886
  • Somehow ERR_MultipleAnalyzerConfigsInSameDir got declared in warnings range for VB #54267
    17.0
  • ArgumentNullException on CSharpRemoveUnusedVariableCodeFixProvider. #49827
    17.1
  • [Generators] The AnalyzerConfigOptionsProvider.GetOptions does not use the proper file path #47786
    17.0
  • Investigate lambda return type inference behavior for nested lambdas #56623
    17.0
  • BuildWithSkipAnalyzers is breaking FastUpToDate #56883

PullRequests

Created

  • BoundIsOperator - store `ConversionKind` instead of `Conversion` #56922
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to a singleton storage service per process, instead of per workspace. #56916
    Area-IDE
  • Obsolete the legacy persistence service. #56912
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow 'var' as an explicit lambda expression return type #56911
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • [DNM] Testing pool provider changes - Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Report a level 7 warning for lower-cased type names #56905
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56903
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • CompletionService: remove public constructor #56896
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access for vscode telemetry #56894
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Add cloudcache config for roslyn #56892
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't break if we fork a snapshot after freezing partial semantics #56890
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • String splitter refactoring #56889
    Area-IDE
  • Separate IDE and editorconfig formatting options #56888
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56920
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56919
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add A/B option so we can test how important recoverable syntax trees are. #56921
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add error reporting to Inline Hints #56917
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Emit compiler version to Windows PDB #56759
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Add telemetry to let us know how often our navto cache is benefitting the user. #56909
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Unskip AttributeTests.GenericAttributeParameter_01 #56915
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Don't offer to remove variable in situations where we would crash #56902
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Treat receivers as by-value for interpolated string handler constructors #56864
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, 17.0
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56913
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56914
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add test verifying VB error ranges #56772
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add info to logs so we can determine issue serializing options #56881
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure that OOP feature calls read from the right DB. #56891
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Delete unnecessary code #56895
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Avoid UI thread dependency in IAsyncServiceProvider.GetServiceAsync<TService, TInterface> #56884
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure we match equivalent paths when retrieving analyzer options in global configs #56588
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, 17.0
  • Give each process a unique DB, not each workspace #56897
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Better conversion from expression and lambda return types: add tests and comment for breaking change #56901
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56899
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Delete dead code from analzyer infrastructure #56893
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid UI dependency in CloudCache by passing along the solution folder #56829
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, Next
  • Concurrency issue with fixed fields #56581
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56873
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56898
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56900
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56887
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56923
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update support for finding CodeLens references from source generated files #53043
    Area-IDE
  • Fix formatting of attributes on lambdas #56639
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE, UX Review Requested
  • Delete ImmutableHashMap #31408
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Backlog
  • See through ref pointer indirection when optimizing stack locals #56790
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Resolves issue #53426, translations missing #56885
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • List-patterns: mitigate break with Length property patterns #56721
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Transletion error about "disable OpenApi support" #37202
  • Asp.net core .cshtml's file encoding format is not uft-8 encoded #37201
  • Global default using statements #37200
  • Improve Default Blazor WASM Loading Experience #37199
  • Blazor - cannot use layout from subdirectory #37196
  • Accepting HTTP Requests In Worker Service #37195
  • StateHasChanged () does not work in Blazor server app #37193
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in ValueTaskSourceAsTask #37189
  • Render View or Partial to String #37187
  • Reproducible builds with Razor Class Library in .NET 6 RC1 #37182
  • 'dotnet watch' add an arg to allow reloading in case of rude edits #37190
  • [Blazor] Unfortunate parameter naming #37181
  • Minimal Api doesn't work and throw Exception when project run #37179
  • Startup improvement: updates #37174
  • Startup regression: json #37173
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #37172
  • Model validation. Different property name formats #37170
  • Improve testing setup for minimal apps in repo #37169

Closed

  • Typos in React SPA template FetchData.js #37105
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM publish to Linux isn't working - Docs are misleading #34936
    Discussions
  • support partial class or can use on endpoint to two or more class? #36910
  • Evaluation order of [Authorize] compared to other/child filters? #37117
  • Typeparam whitespace issue in .net6 preview 4. #33404
    6.0.0
  • @typeparam no longer allows trailing semi-colons #33602
    6.0.0
  • MVC model validation in default configuration is very slow if models contain delegate properties #36919
    7.0-preview1
  • _ViewImports.cshtml is read very often #35313
    17.1-Preview1
  • Write doc describing what to do when updating Major version/TFM #35506
    7.0-preview1
  • SecurityStampTest.OnValidateIdentityDoesNotExtendExpirationWhenSlidingIsDisabled #36601
    6.0-rc2
  • HttpContext doesn't exist in Blazor Client #37144
  • Create a .editorconfig that abides by our coding standards #23812
    Razor.Tooling
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_ef, mapaction #37027
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #36973
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #37140

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Authorization header in WebSockets on Node #37205
    area-signalr
  • Apply Linter & Update Yarn for `src/Components/Web.JS` #37203
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21480.20 #37192
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Add additional types to SuppressChildValidationMetadataProvider (#37150) #37188
    area-mvc
  • Cleanup YAML parameters and settings #37186
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix ambiguous BindAsync error #37185
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.0
  • Update selenium-standalone #37184
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Update Selenium dependencies #37183
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] JS root component registration #37180
    area-blazor
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `955c7f8` to `3b49be0` #37176
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `955c7f8` to `3b49be0` #37175
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update gRPC template reference to Grpc.AspNetCore #37168
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc
  • [release/5.0] Clear layout directories before copies #37165
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • Backport Razor Support `;` after `@typeparam` to 6.0 GA #37167
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, area-razor.compiler, 6.0.0
  • Skip Helix tests when skipping tests #37171
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Use 1ES pools again #37153
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `955c7f8` to `3b49be0` #37177
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Razor Support `;` after `@typeparam` #37148
    area-mvc, area-razor.compiler, 7.0-preview1
  • Exclude additional types from being validated #37150
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Add doc for updating Major Version & TFM #37020
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Don't allow modifying WebRootPath after initialization #37147
    area-web-frameworks
  • Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #37039
    area-runtime
  • Try out helix retry #37137
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix ambiguous BindAsync error #37142
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/5.0] Use new Hosted build pools #37162
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/3.1] Use new Hosted build pools #37161
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [Accessiblity] Set aria-current for manage nav #37110
    area-identity
  • Avoid inferring RequiredAttribute for properties of types in the fram… #37145
    area-mvc
  • [release/3.1] Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36895
    area-infrastructure
  • Revert "[release/5.0] Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now" #36564
    area-infrastructure, 5.1.12
  • [release/2.1] Use new Hosted build pools #37159
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/5.0] Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36894
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Don't clear NuGet caches at all #37163
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Enhancement] Allow apps to be programmatically exited #2814
  • [Spec] Move Toolbar handler code into Core #2812
  • [Bug] Padding on container clips children content #2809
  • [Bug] Layout width measure issue with margin #2808
  • [Bug] Fix Android NavigationManager to not use a static dictionary for communicating to children #2805
  • [Bug] Add better concept of Active vs Appearing as it relates to Modal Pages and the core app #2804
  • [Bug] ArrangeChildren makes glitch(performance hit) on different Android API version #2802
  • [Bug] Nesting NavigationPages inside TabbedPages is currently broken on Android #2801
  • [Spec] Rework FlyoutPage on WinUI to use NavigationView opposed to SplitView #2800
  • [Bug] Fix TabbedPage as root page #2799
  • [Bug] (Android) Entry control returns cursor when typing to the beginning after each character typed in #2798
  • [Spec] Convert FlyoutPage to Handler on Android #2797
  • [Spec] Rebuild TabbedPage On WinUI against NavigationView instead of Pivot #2796
  • [Bug] Custom layout OnMeasure and OnLayout not triggered while remove and add new child when it placed in scroll view #2794
  • Support to get drag and drop position from DragEventArgs #2793
  • Xamarin Auth and .NET Maui with Facebook deprecation of embedded browsers #2791
  • [Bug] MAUI new template missing dependencies in IDE #2790
  • [Bug] [iOS] Storyboard not being generated, app layout is wrong. #2787
  • Blazor--CascadingAuthenticationState components not working #2786

Closed

  • [Bug] Incorrect placement of views with margins #2803
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • [Enhancement] Simplify making Navigation Drawers #1219
  • Back button not displayed in WinUI title bar while using NavigationPage #1568
  • <!-- Thanks for reporting issues of Telegram Messenger for iOS! #2785
  • [Bug] No android OS API 31 option in MAUI App #2765

PullRequests

Created

  • Multi Window Support #2811
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • [AndroidX.targets] Bump to net6.0-android31.0 AndroidX packages. #2810
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807

Merged

  • Adjust margin calculations #2806
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.101-preview.9
  • Work around WinUI layout cycles in templates #2795
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.101-preview.9

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migrations executed individually pass, executing all migrations fails #26234
  • Make value converting nullable types internal for 6.0 #26230
    6.0.0
  • EntityFrameworkExperimentalAttribute #26229
  • Why is AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() different to .AsTracking(QueryTrackingBehavior.NoTrackingWithIdentityResolution)? #26227
    6.0.0

Closed

  • Scaffolding many-to-many creates excessive new lines in OnModelCreating #26207
  • Model differ cannot alter column when type mapping is missing #26168
  • QueryFilterBuilder extension suggestion #26146
  • ObjectDisposedException after migration on net5 #26196
  • UsingEntity overloads could be more helpful at matching the by-convention configuration #26208
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Respect AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution in AsTracking method #26233
  • [6.0] Mark internal the ValueConverter constructors that allow conversion of nulls #26232
  • [6.0] Fix context pooling concurrency issue #26226
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26223
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Docs typo #26225
  • Use covariant return types in RelationalTypeMappingSource #26224
  • Discover join type FK properties using the same naming convention as when creating them #26221
